description: Enjoy this beautiful summer salad recipe of juicy nectarines, sweet currants and nutty pecans for crunch. Make it as an easy lunch or perfect to take on a picnic.
keywords: Grain salad,Low saturated fat,High fibre,Low salt,Christmas,Salad,Dec 2020,Stone fruit
name: Nectarine & Grain Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 white nectarines, halved, destoned, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Cook barley in a large saucepan of boiling water for 25 minutes or until just tender. Drain. Refresh under cold water. Drain.
Meanwhile, place currants and vinegar in a small saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to the boil, then boil for 1 minute. Remove pan from heat and stir in oil and season.
Combine barley, nectarine and rocket on platter. Scatter over pecans, drizzle with dressing and serve.
